recommended for your first time visit solo as this double deck bus will take you around the city the bus tickets can be bought at dinas perhubungan if you drive car you can park your car on the parking area and get in the busthe bus schedule is on 12 until 2 pm take 2 hours for the city tour the guide will explain about the place building if you choose the seat upstair it will be more exciting but please be more careful as sometimes the window hit the tree branches and also its bit hot

a must try in solo to get to know more better about the cityticket 20rb have to come earlier when holiday cause might be crowded or worse u cant get ticket the bus only run on saturday and sunday departure time 0900 1200 and 1500 so you had better come 1 hour before or 30 min before during peak season area surrounding nice many street food toilet in the building need maintenance if u want original 1st double decked bus in solo go with the red one 😀

museum radya pustaka offers a profound glimpse into javanese culture and history its a mustvisit for anyone traveling to solo providing both educational and cultural enrichment we highly recommend it for families history enthusiasts and anyone interested in the heritage of java this museum housing a comprehensive collection of artifacts such as keris spears and wayang each piece tells a story of the rich heritage of java making it an essential stop for anyone interested in the regions history the museum is wellmaintained and the historical value it offers is immense we were particularly impressed by the wide array of keris and other traditional weapons each meticulously preserved and displayed the wayang shadow puppets collection is also noteworthy providing insights into the traditional art forms of java our visit was enhanced by the knowledgeable guides who provided detailed explanations of the artifacts and their significance the museums layout is visitorfriendly and the displays are wellorganized making it easy to navigate through the rich history of the area museum radya pustaka is one of the oldest museums in indonesia founded in 1890 the entrance fee is affordable making it accessible to a wide audience allocate at least 12 hours to fully appreciate the exhibits photography is allowed in most parts of the museum so bring your camera to capture the intricate details of the artifacts

tumurun private museum in solo is a delightful destination for art enthusiasts and families alike its smaller size and focused collection provide a unique and enriching experience the beautiful displays photo opportunities and the personal touch of a private collection make it a standout attraction in solo dont miss the chance to explore this cultural treasure during your visit one of the highlights of our visit was the numerous photoworthy spots throughout the museum the museum is a private collection from the family that owns sritex adding a personal and unique touch to the exhibits each artwork and item is carefully curated making the visit both educational and visually enjoyable a unique aspect of tumurun private museum is the strict time slot system visitors are only allowed to enter during their designated 1hour time slot this system ensures that the museum never feels crowded allowing for a more intimate and comfortable viewing experience to make the most of your visit its highly recommended to purchase tickets online in advance and arrive on time the museum itself is beautifully maintained clean and thoughtfully arranged the staff members are friendly and knowledgeable adding to the overall positive experience despite its size the museum offers a rich cultural and artistic experience that shouldnt be missed useful tip since the museum operates on a strict time slot system make sure to book your tickets online ahead of time to secure your preferred slot arrive a bit early to avoid any lastminute rush and to fully enjoy your allotted hour inside the museum

liburan kali mengajak anak mengenal sejarah indonesia salah satunya berkunjung monas memilih berkendara dgn naik kereta stasiun bekasi menuju juanda banyak kuliner khas jakarta disekitar juanda hingga monas juanda naik bajaj yaa mengenalkan salah satu kendaraan roda tiga yg jakarta kawasan monas berjalan kaki menikmati pemandangan menuju pintu loket tiket dibeli tunai non tunai memakan waktu banyak mengantri krn banyak petugas yg membantu monas sama waktu muda dulu kesini hehe dalamnya dudukduduk menunggu anak berkeliling menbaca sejarah indonesia monas toilet perempuan 2 pintu membuat antrian pipis mengular digabung tempat wudhu jadi licin krn air dimanamana mohon jd perhatian khawatir anakanakorg tua terjatuh sayang sekali pukul 4 sore monas disterilkan semua pengunjung hrs segera keluar area pdhl dulu malam yaa melihat warna warni indahnya monas hehe so far bagus jg sih peraturan monas jd lebih terjaga kebersihan ketertibannya

as people says u dont go to jakarta if u not visitting ancol so same as many iconic place that become tourist destination or place to spend time with family and friends or private time alone ancol is a whole package with many attraction and rides beach reastaurant support facility enormous parking area food stall minimarket or many spot to play and to chill its open start from 6am for ancol beach and art market but for others like dufan bird land sea world atlantis water adventure allianz ecopark ocean dream samudra faunaland gondola ect it open between 7am to 10am yet it closed between 4pm to 12pm according to either weekday or weeend enterance ticket to accsess whole area start from idr30000 each car and idr7000 for each person exclude child with height under 80cm for free i suggest to explore with any transportation because its to big and spend much time to try one by one for one day will be imposible for entering ancol beach its free white sand large plaza and pedestrians way friendly design for disability arraged and clean minimarket restaurant food stall snack corners toys shop mat rent boat rent accu car toy rent electric bicycle rent sand toys cafe swimming equipment shop floating restos floating arch bridge concert canopi area vegetation imitation waterfall many street sign rinse area toilet ect spend some time will be whole time if u cant manage ur time specially if u travel with kids food and beverage rates not to expensive if u carry from outside or buy like snack or drinks except from restaurant or minimarket so take my advice bring ur own mat and food from home because to rent mat u need to pay idr25000 for 1 mat with size up to 6 person or less thats it we focused on ancol beach next review would be another zona inside ancol area happy holiday travellers

central park mall in jakarta stands out as a premier shopping and entertainment destination offering a dynamic blend of retail therapy and leisure activities spanning across a vast area the malls sleek and modern architecture immediately captivates visitors upon arrival the expansive layout provides ample space for shoppers to explore and navigate comfortably without feeling overwhelmed by crowds one of the malls biggest draws is its impressive array of shops catering to a diverse range of tastes and preferences from luxury brands to local boutiques fashion enthusiasts will find plenty to indulge in moreover the mall boasts an extensive selection of dining options ranging from international cuisine to authentic indonesian delicacies whether craving sushi pizza or traditional street food visitors are spoilt for choice what sets central park mall apart is its vibrant atmosphere and commitment to providing a holistic shopping and leisure experience whether strolling through its stylish corridors enjoying a meal with loved ones or catching a movie visitors can expect nothing short of excellence with its convenient location and extensive amenities central park mall remains a top choice for locals and tourists seeking a memorable outing in jakartas bustling urban landscape

museum macan modern and contemporary art museum museum art jakarta merupakan sebuah titik penting industri pariwisata seni kontemporer indonesia institusi pertama memberikan akses publik koleksi seni modern kontemporer signifikan museum menjadi destinasi utama penggemar seni lokal internasional lokasi strategis daerah kebon jeruk jakarta barat museum macan menarik minat wisatawan pengunjung tertarik seni modern fasilitas museum luas 4000 m persegi menyediakan ruang pendidikan konservasi ruang pameran memungkinkan kolaborasi seniman lokal internasional kebersihan kerapian pelayanan ramah menjadi faktor penting memberikan pengalaman memuaskan pengunjung fasilitas ticketing mudah adanya lobby akses utama menciptakan kemudahan pengunjung museum macan memberikan kontribusi signifikan pengembangan seni indonesia menjadi destinasi penting mengeksplorasi kekayaan seni modern kontemporer wisatawan lokal maupun mancanegara

this place is only meant for art lovers for commoners this is going to be boring and not fascinating also good to note that they change their art installation regularly so don’t get fooled by the pictures and videos that people has posted months ago those are not there any more in the museum i felt it would be nice if they have display and details about what is the current art installation near the ticketing place good for commoners to decide whether to visit or not when we went the exhibits kept were not interesting for eyes so we got bored easily and left the place soon may be if you are into art might enjoy it more

jakarta cathedral is so beautiful and the mosque across the street made it feel like i was protected and at peace the cathedral was amazing especially with the murals and energy we even got to witness a wedding there which was lucky the roman cathedral built in neogothic style around 1900 in central jakarta is one of the oldest churches in the city the paintings on the walls are nice the design is stunning but theres not much parking for visitors however there are helpful facilities around like toilets food stalls and souvenir shops the best part was that the cathedral is ♿accessible for people with different abilities it has ramps and accessible washrooms making it easy for everyone to visit
gereja katedral jakarta museumnya sangat menarik mengetahui sejarah gereja katolik masuk indonesia dijelaskan detil visual

i love how catherdal and mosque stand by each other beautiful catherdal you can take pray or even casual sightseeing i am myself non christian and just casually enter and can join their misa pray group

292023😍 kunjungan pertama gereja katedral jakarta bangunan unik artistik sangat megah memukau😍 pantas rumah ibadah jemaat katolik gereja dinobatkan tempat wisata umum didalam gereja pagar pembatas wisatawan diperbolehkan memasuki pintu gerbang tersebut bagian depan dikhususkan jemaat beribadah🙏 dibagian samping gereja museum katedral disana tertulis sejarah waktu pertama pembangunan gereja dilakukan terdapat foto” romo terdahulu sekarang👍 wisata unik😍 sangat recommended layak dikunjungi👍👍👍😍😍😍

visiting the jakarta history museum was a captivating journey through time situated in the heart of the old city its location in a historic building added to its unique charm the exhibits were fascinating offering a glimpse into jakartas rich history however i couldnt help but feel that the artifacts deserved a more climatecontrolled environment with air conditioning especially given the tropical climate nonetheless it was a memorable experience that i would recommend to anyone interested in delving into jakartas past additionally they have a nice souvenir shop perfect for taking home a piece of jakartas history

museum sejarah jakarta biasa sebut museum fathillah merupakan bangunan balai kota batavia dibangun tahun 17071710 diresmikan tanggal 30 maret 1974 bapak ali sadikin museum sejarah jakarta apa aja sih museum fatahillah nahhh objekobjek museum perjalanan sejarah jakarta hasil penggalian arkeologi keramik gerabah batu prasasti koleksi lainnya berada berbagai ruang yg mau detailnya cek google mengenai apaapa aja kalian tau museum fatahillah banget nih kunjungan langsung museumnya jam operasional selasa minggu pukul 0900 1500 tiket masuk rp 5000 orang kunjungan weekend lumayan padat pengunjung jadi museum cukup pengap terlalu banyak lalu lalang orang sulit melihat koleksi museum terlalu padat mengantri melihat bergantian yaa temanteman selamat berkunjung ✌❤❤

museum indonesia is a fascinating and informative destination that provides visitors with a deeper understanding of indonesias rich history and rich cultural heritage located in jakarta this museum offers a comprehensive collection of artifacts artwork and exhibits that showcase the diverse traditions customs and achievements of the indonesian people upon entering the museum visitors are greeted with a grand and elegant building that houses a vast array of exhibits spread over multiple floors the layout and organization of the museum are wellplanned making it easy for visitors to navigate through the different sections and appreciate the exhibits at their own pace one of the highlights of museum indonesia is its impressive collection of traditional costumes which represents the cultural diversity of indonesias various regions each costume is meticulously displayed providing visitors with a visual feast and a glimpse into the vibrant traditional attire worn throughout the country

amazing museum that mainly showcases indonesian weaving masks and traditional costumes some traditional costumes worn by the president for formal events are also displayed conveniently located near the information centre this museum is free of charge and is a great introduction to indonesia before you visit the other parts generally quiet the displays are well maintained and informative english informations are provided by scanning the qr code of the exhibit the exterior is amazing beautifully decorated and calming you can easily spend 1 hour here so be mindful if you want to explore other parts of the park as well

this place is a real time machine i used to visiting ppiptek almost every week due to indosat galileo hype 90s kid here so i remembered most of the exhibits there i had a impression that ppiptek was really fun back then as a child 2 decades later back to this place visiting as a parent bringing my 2 year old son as long as i could remember 70 of the exhibits with additions here there are still the same like i used to play as elementary student back then i jokingly told my husband that this place is an epitome of indonesias science condition undeveloped abandoned 🫠 many of the exhibits here are broken places are quite dim its very sad to see isc in such condition last week we had a chance to visited petrosains at klcc i realized comparing isc to petrosains isnt quite fair considering the entrance fee at isc is very cheap but both of them are stateowned petrosains under petronas and isc under brin hoping this place will get a huge maintenance revitalization a lot of fund is needed tho since higher education considered as tertriary maybe nah 🫠

truly hidden gem museum randomly found this museum menikmati weekend kemang museum umumnya awalnya ngga punya ekspektasi tinggi sama museum surprisingly i was totally amazed with this museum museum aslinya rumah pribadi milik alm mr sjahrial sejak muda memiliki hobi mengoleksi barangbarang antik bersejarah terdapat ±4000 koleksi berasal indonesia luar negeri museum dipandu seorang guide menjelaskan ruangan beserta koleksi dalamnya ruangan memiliki nama diberi nama mr sjahrial sendiri terdapat beberapa aturan diikuti pengunjung salah satunya diperkenankan mengambil foto museum sesuai namanya “museum tengah kebun” museum dibangun tengah kebun seluas 3500 meter persegi sangat luas asri area kebun pengunjung diperbolehkan mengambil foto museum dibuka gratis publik waktu weekend sabtuminggu berkunjung museum melakukan reservasi terlebih this museum deserves to be well known i had a great weekend here and i will surely visit this place again

awalnya susah sekali membuat reservasi museum mencoba via google ig tiada balasan adminnya akhirnya mengunjungi museum cuma 1 kata aja luar biasa koleksinya mulai jaman pra sejarah hingga abad 20 dikumpulkan seluruh dunia melalui balai lelang internasional sebagian hadiqh kolega sejak pak syahrial djalil berusia 30an masuk museum gratis berombongan maksimal 16 orang balita kurang disarankan mengingat koleksi museumnya tdk pelindungnya konsep kunjungan museum dibuat sedang bertamu sesungguhnya tempat memang rumah tinggal yg didedikasikan pemiliknya utk menjadi museum rumahnya adem dikelilingi taman sirkulasi udaranya bagus sungguh sebuah pengalaman tour house yg menyenangkan gerbang museum gerbang rumah umumnya berupa pintu kayu yg selalu tertutup bel pojok kanan penjaga yg membukakan pintu banyak aturannya utk mengunjungi museum 1 disarankan datang 30 menit sebelumnya 2 tdk membawa tas besar tas kecil diselempang depan 3 berganti sandal japit yg disediakan krn khawatir sepatu terlalu kotor utk menginjak karpet rumah 4 disediakan air minum pendopo 5 tdk berfoto museum berfoto areal taman belakang selasar sedikit saran utk pengelola museum 1 dibeberapa sudut debu cukup tebal disayangkan mengurangi keindahan koleksi 2 beberapa koleksi kayu kotoran rayapnya mungkin cek utk dirawat koleksi yg berharga tersebut tahan lama 3 beri kesempatan pengunjung rombongan berfoto sepuasnya areal yg dibolehkan pengalaman hari foto2 sangat terbatas waktunya alasan jam 1230 rombongan jd terburu2 jd tdk konsentrasi mendengarkan uraian guidenya mungkin pengunjung pengalaman berbeda bs berfoto sepuasnya halaman belakang endingnya tetep merekomendasikan museum dikunjungi terimakasih

dikenal margomulyo mangrove park mmp terletak kelurahan margomulyo balikpapan merupakan sebuah kawasan konservasi hutan mangrove difungsikan destinasi wisata kawasan menyuguhkan pemandangan indah kesejukan khas tanaman mangrove wisata kawasan mempunyai fungsi utama sebai pelindung pantai pengaruh gelombang laut kawasan memiliki luas total sebesar 40 ha gunakan konservasi seluas 20 ha terdapat lebih 10 jenis mangrove diantaranya terlihat dominan avicennia alba a marina sonneratia alba s caseolaris rhizophora apiculata r mucronata vegetasi mangrove kawasan terdapat seragam fauna baik fauna arboreal burung monyet bekantan maupun fauna akuatik berbagai jenis ikan belanak blodok lainlain udang kepiting berkunjung sempat melihat bekantan

cobalah membuat janji pak agus selaku pengelola bila mau masuk hutan trekking bersama guide biaya guide 50100k mungkin lebih rute jauh banyak orang rute bervariasi adq yg rute pendek 45 km bolak balik cocok anak anak lansia sehat rute menengah panjang semakin jauh rutenya semakin masuk hutan semakin rapat pepohonannya semakin lembab siapkan sandal bagian pathway berbentuk jembatan jembatan kecil area dekat waduk yg terendam air pasca hujan berbagai macam tanaman pepohonan besar sini termasuk berbagai jenis jamur yg cantik hewan hewan burung marsupial mammal berbagai serangga kucing hutan beruang madu meskipun jarang terlihat yg baru ditemukan balikpapan jahe raksasa asli balikpapan jangan lupa membawa anti nyamuk nyamuknya luar biasa pakai kaos kakicelana panjang lintah kecil yg melompat pergelangan kaki toko hlsw menjual madu kelulut yg banyak dipanen area beberapa kerajinan pahatan anti nyamuk olesan direkomendasikan datang pagi jam 910 makan siang hutan pulang sore camping hutan toilet yg sedang dibangun camping ground bagian depan

jungle trekking for today cuma tau hlsw buku pklh sekarang beneran kesini hutan lindung yg didalamnya banyak satwa tanaman endemik termasuk yg langka baiknya sih pake guide bayar rp 100000 dianter keliling dikenalin isi hutan foto2 camera trap hitung2 membantu pariwisata lokal jg kan langsung waduk masuk wilayahnya utilities pertamina takut krn kan hutan alami yg dikelola pertamina jadi cari aman sekalian lebih eksplor infonya dibuatkan jalur paving jd ga tersesat lg utk jalan2 disini rencana walaupun aku suka yg krn lebih liar lebih alami yg temukan disini kupukupu karna warnanya hijau cerah berkilau kalo kena sinar matahari yg sayangnya aku kurang tenang jd ga keambil fotonya krn terkesima banget ratusan jenis kupu2 lainnya capung moth ular air jejak babi hutan pastinya nyamuk hutan pacet 😂 kalo kesini baiknya bawa lotion anti nyamuk sepatu boots abis hujan digigit pacetnya sih gak sakit darah2nya yg seolah2 kaya gawat banget🤣 utk tanamannya mulai dr kayu bawang beneran bau bawang putih daunnya ulin bajakah banggeris rotan bahkan jg kantung semar lewatin camping ground tp gak mampir krn hutan bgt bawa 2 balita takutnya kelamaan didalam ntar dimakan nyamuk yg 😅 selanjutnya waduk ikan pipih muncul2 katanya diujung jembatan sebrang buaya yg suka berjemur liat camera trap org utan beruang madu ayam hutan macan dahan kucing tp kya macan tutul berbagai jenis burung so glad to see this beautiful jungle for the fresh air too💚💚💚

rumah cagar budaya balikpapan terletak daerah kebun sayur tepatnya jalan letjen suprapto nama rumah cagar budaya dahor heritage sejarah kota balikpapan awal hingga temukan melalui berbagai foto tersimpan baik sini rumah cagar budayadahor heritage menjadi salah satu tempat warga balikpapan mengenal mempelajari sejarah awal berdirinya kota balikpapan rumah cagar budaya berbentuk rumah panggung merupakan ciri khas rumah adat kalimantan timur rumahnya tinggi lantai lebih tinggi tanah rumah berbentuk kotak atap berbentuk kerucut bahan sirap

rumah sebelumnya rumah tempat tinggal karyawan pertamina balikpapan terbuat kayu ulin kayu besi tetap kokoh bertahan sekarang bangunan rumah berada wilayah dahor dibangun sejak jaman belanda sekarang tinggal beberapa unit bertahan dilestarikan cagar budaya kota balikpapan salah satu unit terdapat museum kota balikpapan menggambarkan bagaimana balikpapan tempoe doeloe jaman belanda jepang termasuk dalamnya sejarah perminyakan awal sultan aji muhammad sulaiman memberikan ijin belanda mengelola minyak kota balikpapan tempat melihat tempat tempat dipergunakan orang belanda berkreasi

tugu australia merupakan tugu mengenang jasa tentara australia new zealand pengusiran pengambil alihan balikpapan khususnya cengkraman tentara jepang perang dunia ii tugu australia terletak jl sudirman tepatnya depan lapangan merdeka balikpapan dinding tugu australia terlalu tinggi tersebut tercatat pasukan nama australia merebut mengamankan beberapa wilayah kalimantan timur balikpapan sangasanga kutai kartanegara kota sekitarnya jepang menguasai sumber pengolahan minyak khusunya hasil bumi lainya mengenang pasukan australia new zealand tanggal 25 april peringati anzac day australian and new zealand army corps peringatan anzac day biasanya laksanakan tugu australia jaranag hadiri duta besar bail australia new zealand disarikan kayin fauzi owner pondok mantau produsen mantau sapi capit kepiting lada hitam oleholeh khas balikpapan indonesia

kenjeran lama beach in surabaya indonesia offers a vibrant and authentic local experience the beach is lively with families food vendors and fishermen creating a bustling atmosphere visitors can enjoy traditional snacks and seafood from various stalls while the beach has a long stretch of sand and calm waters cleanliness can be an issue due to occasional litter the sanggar agung temple nearby adds a cultural and spiritual element to the visit overall kenjeran lama beach is ideal for experiencing local culture and activities though it would benefit from better cleanliness efforts

i recently had the opportunity to take a boat ride at wisata perahu kalimas and it was a unique experience the first thing to note is that the tickets are incredibly cheap making it accessible for everyone however theres a slight challenge for foreigners as they only accept qris payment with no cash being accepted fortunately i had some friendly locals help me purchase tickets using their ewallets which was very kind of them the boat ride itself covers a short distance but it offers a picturesque view of the kalimas river in surabaya i recommend taking the ride at night because the riverside is adorned with beautiful lights creating a magical atmosphere the combination of the calm river and the sparkling lights is truly enchanting overall the experience was beautiful and i would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting surabaya just be prepared to navigate the payment method and youll be in for a delightful evening on the water

sanggar agung temple located inside kenjeran park in surabaya sanggar agung temple or also called hong san tang temple is a sacred temple that up to now is actively being used as a place of worship for our bhuddism friends it is a holy area the distinctive feature of this temple is a statue of kwan im goddess as high as 20 meters which is located on the seashore this temple also open for public as tourist destination so everyone are welcome here but must give a high respect to its holy and sacred place usually being used as a center to hold big ceremonies for our buddhism friend it always so crowded with festivals and attractions

alunalun kota surabaya banyak alunalun kotakota besar indonesia memiliki sejarah kaya beberapa bangunan bersejarah menambah pesonanya alunalun terdapat beberapa bangunan jaman dulu berdiri kokoh menjadi saksi bisu perkembangan kota berikut beberapa bangunan bersejarah alunalun surabaya 1 balai pemuda dikenal societeit concordia masa kolonial gedung merupakan tempat pertemuan kegiatan sosial warga eropa kini balai pemuda sering digunakan acara seni budaya tetap mempertahankan arsitektur klasiknya megah 2 gedung grahadi sebuah bangunan kolonial kini menjadi rumah dinas gubernur jawa timur dibangun abad ke18 gedung grahadi memiliki arsitektur khas belanda halaman luas taman indah 3 gedung internatio gedung berlokasi jauh alunalun menjadi salah satu saksi sejarah pertempuran surabaya 1945 gedung merupakan kantor perdagangan sekarang sering dikunjungi nilai sejarahnya 4 hotel majapahit meski tepat alunalun hotel majapahit berjarak tak terlalu jauh merupakan bangunan bersejarah sangat penting didirikan tahun 1910 hotel terkenal peristiwa perobekan bendera belanda 1945 menjadi simbol perlawanan rakyat surabaya bangunanbangunan menambah keindahan karakter alunalun menjadi pengingat masa lalu kota kaya sejarah perjuangan aset berharga menunjukkan perkembangan surabaya masa kolonial hingga kini

a beautiful monument and statue surrounded by park museum and many interesting landmarks i came here early in the morning on my way to the airport before leaving surabaya this is a great place to learn more about the history of indonesia struggle against colonialism as well as the history of surabaya city beside the monument it also has the statue of our proclamators soekarno hatta as well as museum of 10 november our heroes day commemorating the battle in surabaya there are many reliefs which depict some historical moments complete with its stories and information the park is also spacious love to see the green field parking spots are available there are ramps on the entrance and there are areas which can easily be visited by those using wheelchairs ♿️

alunalun kota surabaya banyak alunalun kotakota besar indonesia memiliki sejarah kaya beberapa bangunan bersejarah menambah pesonanya alunalun terdapat beberapa bangunan jaman dulu berdiri kokoh menjadi saksi bisu perkembangan kota berikut beberapa bangunan bersejarah alunalun surabaya 1 balai pemuda dikenal societeit concordia masa kolonial gedung merupakan tempat pertemuan kegiatan sosial warga eropa kini balai pemuda sering digunakan acara seni budaya tetap mempertahankan arsitektur klasiknya megah 2 gedung grahadi sebuah bangunan kolonial kini menjadi rumah dinas gubernur jawa timur dibangun abad ke18 gedung grahadi memiliki arsitektur khas belanda halaman luas taman indah 3 gedung internatio gedung berlokasi jauh alunalun menjadi salah satu saksi sejarah pertempuran surabaya 1945 gedung merupakan kantor perdagangan sekarang sering dikunjungi nilai sejarahnya 4 hotel majapahit meski tepat alunalun hotel majapahit berjarak tak terlalu jauh merupakan bangunan bersejarah sangat penting didirikan tahun 1910 hotel terkenal peristiwa perobekan bendera belanda 1945 menjadi simbol perlawanan rakyat surabaya bangunanbangunan menambah keindahan karakter alunalun menjadi pengingat masa lalu kota kaya sejarah perjuangan aset berharga menunjukkan perkembangan surabaya masa kolonial hingga kini

suasana kurang nyaman bau bau sedap menuju kawasan makam sunan ampel diperkirakan datang pulau jawa tahun 1443 m tujuan kedatangannya menemui bibinya dyah dwarawati dyah dwarawati seorang putri champa menikah raja majapahit bergelar bhre kertabhumi sunan ampel makamnya terletak kampung ampel kota surabaya anggota dewan wali songo tertua memiliki peranan besar pengembangan dakwah islam jawa tempat nusantara historiografi lokal dituturkan raden rahmat datang jawa bersama saudara tuanya bernama ali musada ali murtadho saudara sepupunya bernama raden burereh abu hurairah lembaga riset islam pesantren luhur sunan giri malang sejarah dakwah islamiyah sunan giri 1975 imam rahmatullah bersama ayahnya datang jawa tujuan dakwah islamiyah disertai saudaranya bernama ali murtadho kawannya bernama abu hurairah putra raja champa mendarat tuban tinggal tuban beberapa lama ayahandanya wafat imam rahmatullah berangkat majapahit menemui bibinya dikawin raja majapahit beragama buddha djajadiningrat sejarah banten 1983 dikisahkan raden rahmat dewasa mendengar peperangan jawa tiga orang pandhita muda ulama muda lainnya burereh seh salim saudaranya tak sebut namanya raden rahmat berangkat ka jawa keempat orang tadi berangkat jawa champa diruntuhkan seorang kafir sanggora kedatangan sunan ampel majapahit diperkirakan terjadi awal dasawarsa keempat abad ke15 arya damar menjadi adipati palembang sebagaimana riwayat menyatakan jawa raden rahmat singgah palembang thomas w arnold the preaching of islam 1977 raden rahmat sewaktu palembang menjadi tamu arya damar selama bulan berusaha memperkenalkan islam raja muda palembang arya damar tertarik islam hampir diikrarkan menjadi islam berani menanggung risiko menghadapi tindakan rakyatnya terikat kepercayaan lama menyatakan keislamannya hadapan umum cerita setempat memeluk islam arya damar memakai nama ario abdillah babad ngampeldenta menuturkan pengangkatan resmi raden rahmat imam surabaya gelar sunan kedudukan wali ngampeldenta dilakukan raja majapahit raden rahmat lebih dikenal sebutan sunan ngampel sumber legenda islam dicatat hj de graaf thgth pigeaud kerajaankerajaan islam jawa peralihan majapahit mataram 1986 raden rahmat diangkat menjadi imam masjid surabaya pejabat pecat tandha terung bernama arya sena penempatan raden rahmat surabaya dilakukan resmi pecat tandha terung disertai keluargakeluarga dipercayakan kerajaan majapahit dipimpinnya lembaga riset islam pesantren luhur sunan giri malang 1975 hubungan baik raja majapahit raden rahmat diberi izin tinggal ampel disertai keluargakeluarga museum paling menarik surabaya semua museum surabaya berbayar museum gratis bahkan semua bentuk jasa disini dipungut biaya tour guide pihak museum parkir konsep museum bercerita sejarah gedung de javasche bank hingga sejarah perkembangan perbankan indonesia disini terdapat penjelasan mengenai sejarah berdirinya bank indonesia museum sangat unik memasuki brangkas digunakan menyimpan uang emas barang pameran disini beragam mulai uang lama barang kuno hingga perkembangan mesin perbankan penataan museum sangat rapih museum ditata sedemikian rupa hingga ruangan dalamnya terasa lebih luas lega perawatannya sangat baik kebersihan museum sangat baik pelayanan museum sangat ramah memuaskan pertama masuk mengisi buku tamu terlebih kemudian pegawai meja resepsionis menawarkan diri menjadi tour guide gratis berkeliling sendiri diperkenankan disini toilet cukup nyaman musholla belakang pos satpam museum menjual minuman ringan harga terjangkau jadi pengunjung merasa haus berkeliling membeli ruang sebelah resepsionis parkiran disini sangat luas saking luasannya biasanya digunakan memarkirkan kendaraan milik bank indonesia sangat direkomendasikan kalian pergi surabaya mengunjungi museum

kalo tahu sejarah uang perbankan datanglah museum bi banyak aktivitas menarik lakukan memegang emas 13 kg merasakan pengalaman jadi kasir bank tempo doeloe melihat mesin cetak uang merasakan pengalaman cctv jaman belanda semuanya keren museum tertata rapi aneka zona menarik intinya buat tambah wawasan pengalaman yuk gaskeeeuuunn main museum bareng keluarga teman 💪💪💪

an excellent and wellpreserved heritage building they still have the original temperature regulation system using the water moat under the building they also show us the state of the art surveillance system of that time using mirrors placed in every corner around the safe what fascinated me is the well preserve teller booth it takes us back to many years ago when the bank was still in use ❤️

beautiful building can be made more interesting by displaying real indonesian money with proper explanation staffs are very friendly it has big potential to be better museum maybe with some informative video about the history of money and bank indonesia im ready to revise my review to 5 stars when proper improvement made

an old house since colonialism era which became an alternative venue for exhibition and other public events related to art and culture beside the whitecube galleries in surabaya with a long historical background exhibitions talk shows live music bazaar etc are held in this place people who living here are so nice and welcoming people who visit here mostly learn so many things from things that are happening here agrarian conflict and the sense of belongings the people living here have too

this place is magnificent it has long historical background once i went there i learned about the chinese people who reside in that area they are great people and sincere i saw the mini museum about the chinese carpenter they display it like a museum and there are so many events and activities especially during the lunar new years they have like a lantern festival which is the part of the their culture

taman jayengrono willemsplein taman jayengrono kawasan jembatan merah diresmikan 31 desember 2012 walikota surabaya tri rismaharini pukul 0900 nama taman ambil nama bupati pertama surabaya taman dibuat mengenang semanggat perjuangan arekarek surabaya pertempuran dahsyat kawasan jembatan merah taman jayengrono luasnya 5300 meter persegi letaknya bersebelahan terminal jembatan merah jembatan merah plaza peresmian acara penandatanganan prasasti walikota diwarnai pembubuhan cap tangan 15 pejuang kemerdekaan taman jayengrono merupakan taman tertua surabaya keberadaan taman erat kaitannya kantor keresidenan terletak depan taman mana kantor residen dibangun masa pemerintahan daendels 18081811 diduga taman sejak abab xix makanya taman kota menjadi taman tertua diantara tamantaman surabaya taman jayengrono dikenal taman sejarah banyak peristiwa penting berkaitan tempat salah satunya peristiwa mallaby brigjend mallaby komandan pasukan sekutu terbunuh ledakan granat lempar pejuang kemerdekaan perkirakan lokasi terbunuhnya brigjend mallaby berada taman jayengrono peristiwa inilah kemudian memicu penyerangan kota surabaya segala sisi tgl 10 nopember 1945 jadi tepat kiranya kalau taman jayengrono disebut taman sejarah

this is a private gallery n the resting place of tjong yong hian n wife the elder brother of tjong ah fie it is not open to public however if some family members happen to be visiting they may open the gallery for public visit otherwise it is locked we happen to pass by and spoke to the guard there he was kind enough to allow us into the garden for photography as the gallery was locked we couldnt see inside very well maintained garden n lily pond spectacular was told that his decendents are still living in medan thats why it is well maintained wherelse almost all of tjong a fies descendants have left the country n the nearest wealthy decendant is in jakarta a fies last resting place is in the outskirts n it may be the biggest in all of medan

wisata taman kebun bunga diresmikan mantan walikota medan rahudman harahap tanggal 29 oktober 2011 terletak jalan kejaksaan petisah tengah medan petisah kota medan penjaga taman tersebut budi mengatakan taman kebun bunga merupakan rumah abang tjong a fie tjong yong hian keterangan budi taman kebun bunga dibuat wisata taman edukasi terkait sejarah mengingat jasa tjong yong hian pembangunan kota medan budi menjelaskan taman kebun bunga terdapat ruangan galeri merupakan barangbarang meninggalkan tjong yong hian kalau taman diperbolehkan masuk kalau galeri taman ramai kalai masuk tiket patokan mau memberi seikhlas hati tak apa apa kanar kabar taman nantinya dibuka harga tiket rp 30 ribuan kalau siap renovasi ruang galerinya ujarnya kemarin budi menceritakan pemiliknya membuka taman tersebut hari cheng beng sekarang dibuka beroperasi

museum menceritakan sejarah salah satu orang berpengaruh medan gedungnya dulu rumah tjong a fie kemudian dialihfungsikan jadi museum informasinya cucunya tinggal sana museumnya luas terdiri beberapa section sesuai ruangan rumah tersebut tempatnya wellmaintained kebanyakan otentik asli milik tjong a fie perlu diperhatikan beberapa section dilarang ambil gambar museum menyediakan tour guide better sekalian keliling bareng tour guidenya biar dapet cerita lebih menyeluruh tjong a fie sejarah medan cocok buat jadi opsi wisata tengah kota lokasinya strategis menambah informasi kota medan

gedung rumah tjong a fie merupakan salah satu bangunan bersejarah terletak kota medan sumatera utara dibangun tahun 1895 gedung bekas kediaman tjong a fie seorang pedagang terkemuka masa kolonial belanda medan gedung merupakan perpaduan arsitektur tiongkok eropa melayu memukau mencerminkan kekayaan keberagaman budaya tjong a fie gedung rumah tjong a fie dijadikan museum memamerkan berbagai artefak sejarah kehidupan tjong a fie koleksi seni budaya lainnya gedung rumah tjong a fie menjadi salah satu destinasi wisata sejarah budaya populer medan mengundang pengunjung menjelajahi kekayaan sejarah keindahan arsitektur unik

museum rumah tua terletak jalan ahmad yani kesawan medan lokasi nya dekat kuliner tiptop soto kesawan tiket masuk museum sebesar 35 ribu rupiah museum worth it dikunjungi budaya china peranakan sangat kental museum

when i paid for the ticket the person asks if i speak english i said yes but there wasnt any guide to bring me around so i was kind of confused still the ticket mentions it’s a guided tour though 🤷‍♀️ when walking around the mansion i saw 1 guide bringing a tourist around while speaking indonesian the place doesn’t have good ventilation and can get pretty hot there also wasn’t much information about the decorativesfurniture in here 😅
learned a lot by visiting this heritage the architecture ambience and its history allowed me to feel how they lived their lives at that time overall this place is a must visit in medan

alhamdulillah beribadah ditempat mulia masjid raya al mashun medan sumatera utara salah satu ikon arsitektur spiritual kota paling terkenal dibangun tahun 1906 sultan mamun al rasyid perkasa alamsyah kesultanan deli masjid memadukan gaya arsitektur timur tengah india spanyol menciptakan bangunan memukau unik masjid memiliki kubah utama besar empat menara tinggi menjulang sekitarnya bagian dalamnya dihiasi kaligrafi indah kaca patri berwarnawarni lampu gantung megah menciptakan suasana sakral menenangkan lantai marmer dingin sejuk menambah kenyamanan jamaah beribadah menjadi tempat ibadah utama umat muslim masjid raya al mashun sering dikunjungi wisatawan tertarik sejarah arsitektur lokasinya strategis pusat kota medan membuatnya mudah diakses menjadi salah satu destinasi wajib berkunjung kota masjid menawarkan keindahan arsitektur merupakan simbol toleransi keharmonisan antarumat beragama medan masjid terdapat berbagai fasilitas pendukung area parkir taman kioskios menjual berbagai makanan cenderamata keseluruhan masjid raya al mashun tempat dikunjungi merasakan kedalaman sejarah keindahan arsitektur kekayaan budaya medan keberadaannya pusat spiritual wisata menjadikannya salah satu landmark paling penting kota
masjid arsitektur menawan detail sudut ruangnya cantik terdapat al quran besar berumur lebih 200tahun masyaallah menyaksikan kemegahan masjid kejayaan islam medan bersih marbotnya ramah semua

lokasi masjid tepat simpang ampat jalan sm raja dg jl amaliun sholat idul fitri dimulai raja datang tradisi zaman kerajaan habis sholat biasa jamaah menjaga kebersihan sampah koran plastik alas sholat dibiarkan berserakan pintu utk orang yg keterbatasan fisik orang tua yg susah berjalan
masjid raya awal pendiriannya merupakan bagian kompleks istana maimun gaya arsitekturnya memadukan unsur timur tengah india melayu lokasi sebrang jalan istana maimun

gorgeous waterfall with a thundering splash that goes tens of metres high the walk down and up is around 30 minutes you need to be fit there are some drinks stops along the way for you to break the trip into a few stops the strenuous trip is well worth it as it is a much better view than the one at the top 30k per person and 10k for car parking bring a small towel

air terjun sipisopiso merupakan salah satu destinasi wajib berkunjung berastagi merupakan salah satu andala objek wisata tanah karo objek wisata berlokasi kabupaten karo sumatra utara konon air terjun merupakan salah satu air terjun tertinggi indonesia tingginya melebihi 100 meter bila berada atas melihat dasar air terjun memang terlihat sangat tinggi mencapai dasar air terjun turun menuruni anak tangga lumayan panjang cukup melelahkan turun kemudian naik terbayar tiba bawah menikmati deru suara air terjun panampakannya beruntung bahkan melihat pelangi aliran air terjun beberapa destinasi wisata berlokasi tak jauh air terjun sipisopiso antaranya danau toba hingga taman bunga sapo juma kalah menariknya

the best way to appreciate this waterfall is to go down by the stairs and feel the breeze from the waterfall not too hard hiking for a non active person took around 20 to 30 minutes to go down while enjoying the view many pitstop prepared to take photos please wear watershoes and bring along your raincoat as you might get really wet if you go close enough to the waterfall

museum negeri sumatera utara salah satu museum medan tempatnya luar biasa banyak cerita benda peninggalan sejarah lihat disini pemeliharaan koleksinya sangat perhatikan jaga baik biaya masuk musem terbilang cukup murah 5 ribu menikmati peninggalan sejarah sumatera utara banyak koleksi peninggalan suku batak cerita rakyat peninggalan sejarah lihat disni pelayanan diberikan cukup bagus ramah banyak pelajari disni jadi berkunjung lah museum lebih mengetahui sejarah ketahui

a very interesting history museum of north sumatra from prehistoric times to colonial times to ww2 a little then to more current affairs i paid 30k for my ticket spent a good 15h in here looking at the artifacts and reading the descriptions there are english narrations but i am quite bothered by the mozzies one thing i dun understand is why the descriptions have to be placed so low not just one but many and luckily when i am about to leave a v huge group of small children came well this place is certainly not suitable for children that young owells came on sat morning almost have the place to myself

an aesthetic museum in medan you can find many spot photos while learning the history of north sumatera the charging fee is cheap around rp3000 per person where you can feel comfortable in the museum it has strategic places beside the center road but it is closed at 4pm

hampir banget diserang 3 monyet dewasa kelaparan pas kesini huhuhu aku berkunjung tahura udah sering awal ramadhan iseng pengen trekking santai ternyata ramadhan waktu tepat memonopoli tahura kosong pas nyampe reaksi pertama aku vibes covid betulbetul cuma penjaga pos aja dalem beberapa petugas lalu lalang sesekali naik motor tiket masuk parkir motor kena 23 ribu lanjut perjalanan udaranya segar sekali suara serangga pohon aku jalan menuju curug maribaya melewati goa belanda ternyata keputusan salah a gaada orang monyet lapar turun jalur trekking b gaada orang diserang monyet karna jalan minum susu kotak artinya gaada nolongin 😭 kali 5 menit face down sama segeng monyet aku survival instinct seadanya langsung nangkep kalo semisal aku lari kalah sama monyetnya jadi adu keganasan biar diem ditempat untungnya cerita happy ending penyelamat aku bapak petugas patroli naik motor tibatiba dateng aku jadi ikut dibonceng skor 10 alias aku 0 monyetnya 1 karna berhasil merebut susu kotakku rasa coklat nikmat 😔 curug kosong gaada orang bener2 pandemi pas jalan bawah gaada monyet aku menghindari tkp motong jalan lewat goa belanda sendirian diulangi lewat goa belanda sendirian langit mendung angin berhembus kencang aku menjadikan momen uji keberanian membuktikan aku seorang pejuang parkiran bayar parkir seikhlasnya moral of the story visit tahura ramadhan suasana hutan syahdu jangan jalan makan note jalanan curug maribaya dicor selesai sepenuhnya pengerjaannya jadi beberapa bahan bangunan terletak kanan kiri jalur dibeberapa titik seandainya pakai paving block lebih oke

taman hutan raya tahura ir h djuanda bandung menawarkan pesona alam menarik dikunjungi berikut beberapa perlu dipertimbangkan kelebihan udara sejuk pemandangan asri tahura djuanda terkenal kesejukan udaranya hamparan hutan luas menjadi pilihan tepat refreshing escape hiruk pikuk kota banyak objek wisata alam hutan pepohonan beberapa objek wisata menarik tebing keraton menawarkan pemandangan indah goa jepang sisa peninggalan zaman penjajahan curug dago air terjun memesona aktivitas menyenangkan melakukan hiking trekking camping sekadar jalanjalan santai menikmati udara segar harga tiket terjangkau biaya masuk tahura djuanda relatif murah cocok wisata low budget kekurangan akses jalan beberapa jalur menuju tahura djuanda sempit berliku pastikan menggunakan kendaraan sesuai berhatihati berkendara fasilitas meskipun terus dikembangkan fasilitas tahura djuanda mungkin terbatas dibandingkan tempat wisata lainnya datanglah persiapan matang terutama berencana camping keseluruhan taman hutan raya ir h djuanda cocok wisata alam mencari ketenangan menikmati keindahan bandung sisi berbeda menyukai hiking trekking tempat wajib dicoba tips datanglah pagi hari udara lebih segar menghindari keramaian gunakan sepatu nyaman berjalan bawa perbekalan makanan minuman cukup buang sampah tempatnya jaga kelestarian alam persiapan baik liburan taman hutan raya ir h djuanda menyenangkan

braga salah satu tempat paling ikonik bandung indonesia terletak pusat kota braga distrik sejarah kaya warisan kolonial belanda bangunanbangunan tua dipelihara baik jalan dilapisi batu lampulampu jalan menggantung braga memiliki pesona unik salah satu daya tarik utama braga kafe restoran tersebar sepanjang jalan pengunjung menemukan berbagai macam tempat makan minum mulai kafe bergaya vintage hingga restoran mewah suasana braga sangat ramai terutama akhir pekan wisatawan lokal internasional memadati jalanjalan tempat bersantai menikmati kuliner braga menjadi pusat kegiatan seni budaya terdapat galeri seni teater pertunjukan musik sepanjang jalan acaraacara budaya pameran seni festival makanan sering diadakan braga menarik minat pengunjung merasakan kehidupan kota bandung beragam meskipun braga memiliki pesona sejarah kuat beberapa pengunjung mungkin merasa area mulai kehilangan keasliannya pengaruh modernisasi beberapa bangunan direnovasi diganti struktur baru mengurangi kesan kolonial kental kepadatan lalu lintas kesibukan braga membuat pengalaman berjalanjalan kurang menyenangkan beberapa orang keseluruhan braga destinasi menarik merasakan sejarah budaya bandung meskipun menghadapi tantangan modernisasi braga tetap mempertahankan daya tariknya tempat penuh kehidupan keunikan menjelajahi jalanjalan bersejarah menikmati kuliner seni ditawarkan pengunjung merasakan keindahan kekayaan dimiliki distrik braga

good place to go with young kids for its well maintained playground the playground areas ground is covered by artificial grass so its safe for kids in case they fall down while playing i visited this place during ramadan so i dont know how the normal circumstance is usually city parks in bandung are surrounded by food stall but tiday there was only 1 stall that sell milk many elementary students played to kill the time maybe they were waiting for parents to pick them up or just killing time during fasting the cleanless is good as i said this park is well maintained but i dont know about the restroom are they provide restroom or not but i saw a building with big windows that only contains table and chair try visit this park especially if you have kids that are love playing at playground

curug dago was a famous waterfall that most people do picnic in their leisure time back then that was also be the place of meeting point of an event when i was little maybe in 90s i frequently go here for a walk kindergarten field trip walking event and spent leisure time with my parents and siblings now this place might not that known but i will still recommend it for you people may be surprised that within big city there is waterfall curug dago is still in taman hutan raya ir h juanda or known as tahura dago they dont provide any tickets nor charge us to enter the area but in the waterfall area there are 2 elderlies held a book and asked us to fill the guest book as i saw the goigle review the elderlies ask for money to clean up the waterfall area that are done by them i gave them 5000 for 1 adult so i gave them 10000 for me and husband i asked them is it enough they replied alhamdulillah enough if you want to give more they will surely be glad and grateful the noteworthy of this place is playground area to my way of thinking since i had children playground is important asset and people will be interested to come to the place where there is a playground within but sadly at curug dago many parts of the playground is damaged and broken of course its not safe for children to play there for parents there is a stall that sell cheap food such as indomie coffee nutrisari fry ups bread snacks etc you better go there by motorcycle or by foot if you go yhere by car you can park your car at the alley mouth in the citra green land area wear good shoes for the stairs is slippery and it will be very useful when you go down if you want to carry on your journey you can visit punclut culinary area the plase is nearby ask locals for direction or simply open google map and search punclut you will find roadside stall and many restaurant that serve brown rice friedburnt chicken sambal lalap and many more

gedung sate bandung ikon arsitektur menjadi simbol kota bandung pusat pemerintahan provinsi jawa barat diresmikan tahun 1920 gedung menampilkan gaya arsitektur indoeropa memadukan elemen tradisional indonesia desain kolonial belanda menjadikannya landmark bersejarah menarik wisatawan penduduk lokal nama gedung sate berasal ornamen puncak bangunan menyerupai tusuk sate terdiri enam ornamen bulat melambangkan biaya pembangunan gedung mencapai enam juta gulden desain arsitekturnya unik megah dikelilingi tamantaman asri menambah pesona keanggunan gedung gedung sate berfungsi kantor pemerintahan destinasi wisata edukatif pengunjung mengikuti tur gedung belajar sejarah arsitektur bangunan menikmati pemandangan kota bandung menara puncaknya gedung sate terdapat berbagai fasilitas taman bermain tempat duduk bersantai area kuliner menawarkan berbagai makanan khas bandung kawasan sering menjadi lokasi acara budaya pameran menambah daya tariknya pusat aktivitas masyarakat keindahan arsitektur nilai sejarah fungsinya pusat kegiatan gedung sate bandung destinasi wajib dikunjungi menikmati memahami lebih sejarah budaya kota bandung

gedung sate dibangun tahun 19201924 arsitektur bangunan dirancang tim dipimpin ir j gerber eh de roo g hendriks gemeente van bandoeng diketuai vl sloors pembangunan gedung sate merupakan bagian program pemindahan pusat militer pemerintah hindia belanda meester cornelis wilayah bandung gedung dirancang satu komplek perkantoran instansi pemerintah gouvernements bedrijvengb gedung sate merupakan gedung kantor department verkeer en waterstaat departemen pekerjaan umum pengairan sisi timur laut terdapat gedung hoofdbureau post telegraaf en telefoondienst pusat pos telegraf telepon gedung sate mempunyai gaya arsitektur hybrid perpaduan beberapa gaya arsitektur beberapa bagian gedung menggunakan model rennaisance italia desain jendela mengusung konsep moor spanyol bagian atap mengadopsi arsitektur asia pura bali gedung dipengaruhi ornamen hindu islam penataan bangunan berpola simetris elemen lengkungan berulangulang menciptakan ritme indah unik bagian puncak atap gedung terdapat ornamen 6 tusuk sate 6 tusuk sate melambangkan 6 juta gulden digunakan membangun gedung tersebut menjadikan masyarakat menyebut bangunan “gedung sate” ruang puncak gedung terdapat sebuah alarm otomatis menyala serangan musuh bunyi alarm besar alarm mampu menjangkau hingga luar kota bandung alarm dinyalakan sekali setahun selama 10 menit suara alarm terdengar gedung

this is my first time visiting farm house lembang keisni me time kebetulan dr depok ikut ortu dinas bandung selama beberapa hari jadi memutuskan farm house lembang lokasinya deket hotel merasa kurang nyaman selama berkunjung disini pertama gate masuk mas2 ngomong “sendirian aja neng mau ditemenin nggak” cengengesan sama mas2 lainnya 2 penjaga gate masuk situ udh ga nyaman kok pekerjanya berani ngomong kayak gt pengunjung mentang2 sendirian kesana😀 kedua tiket masuk 35k dituker sama susu kaget size cup susunya kecil banget setau ngeliat socmed perasaan size cup susunya gede deh😀 tiket masuk 35k merasa kurang worth it aktivitas dilakukan hewannya ga banyak baru tau ternyata farm house lembang tuh kecil banget ya😅 ngelilingin sampe abis cuman butuh waktu kurang 30 menit diluar main2 sama hewan beneran pas udh selesai kayak “lah udh gini doan” well maybe my expectation was way too high terus kemarin kesini pas weekdays dibilang cukup sepi tempat udh sekecil ga banyak papasan sama pengunjung cuman pas zona mini zoo aja baru pengunjungnya keliatan banyak parkir mobilnya lumayan digetok 1015k gt lupa padahal disana gaada sejam😅 baru pertama kali mau kesini silahkan aja jangan berekspektasi ketinggian blass gt doang🙏🏻 bangunan2nya keliatan maaf sedikit usang kurang terawat mungkin pihak pengelola dilakukan perubahan tema kedepannya ga kehilangan pengunjung🙌🏻

letsguide puncak bintang is about 1400 m above sea level so the trip is abit challenging u have to use a healthy car or motorcycle for transportation some of the road have a 45° angle to climb have to have quite big engine and high vehicle cause some of the road is bumpy car parking it will cost u 10000 idr and entering the location is an additional 15000 idr per person but it worth it since the facilities here is good toilet musholla and direction board there is also a children playground several camping location and the view is good especially the pine forest from the viewing dock u can see bandung from a distance if there is no cloud and also a sunset if ur lucky no need to bring food here since ther is plenty of warung selling snacks and heavy meal also coffee after all it was a happy journey and quite an experience to go to such places

kalau sedang berkuliah banjarmasin wajib sih datang pasar terapung merupakan ciri khas kalimantan selatan setahu menikmati suasana pasar terapung menyewa satu buah kapal harga 200400ribu rupiah perkapal diisi 1015 orang jadi memang disarankan datang rombongan kalau cuma berdua bertiga mungkin tanyatanya aja sama rombongan kecil menyewa kapal ikut bergabung bangun subuh menuju dermaga berada tepat depan mesjid sultan suriansyah kuin utara solat subuh dulu mesjid baru melanjutkan perjalanan pasar terapung ramai pagi hari sini pedagang terlalu ramai katanya memang makin tahun pasar makin sepi semoga pemerintah tetap mempertahankan kearifan lokal membayar pedagang berjualan jadi instead of difungsikan pasar tempat benarbenar dijadikan destinasi wisata makin lama tradisi makin ditinggalkan akses darat sekarang lebih mudah sunrise pasar terapung salah satu terbaik and dont forget to drop at pulau kembang

selamat pagi kuin melaksanakan jamaah sholat subuh masjid sultan suriansyah tim melanjutkan perjalanan menyusuri sungai kuin sewa klotok pasar terapung kuin dermaga depan masjid sultan suriansyah rp 250000 pulau kembang susuri suasana pagi syahdu sekitaran sungai kuin perjalanan memakan waktu 30 menit perjalanan santai menikmati pemandangan sungai kuin dipertigaan sungai barito haluan klotok ambil kanan menuju pasar terapung jumlahnya sekarang tinggal beberapa banyak beralih siring lokbaintan pilihan pertama makan sop soto sate banjar sensasi mantab makan diatas klotok harganya murmer per porsi rp 15000 rasanya seger gak kalah sama soto bang hehe selesai makan lanjut belanja jeruk murmer 1 bakul cukup rp 25000 dimakan bawa bekal pulau kembang menuju pulau kembang cukup bersensasi kadang berpapasan tongkang besar pengangkut batubara pokoke mantab pagipagi menyusuri sungai kuin ayokebanjarmasin pasarapungsungaikuin

pasar terapung siring is a cultural tourist attraction in banjarmasin they open until night time if you are an early bird this is for you the real floating market is usually held as early as 5am and around 10am activities gradually slow down it is a traditional market where vendors sell various goods from their ‘jukung’ floating on the river

beribadah terasa tentram damai masjid raya sabilal muhtadin salah satu masjid terbesar paling megah kota banjarmasin kalimantan selatan terletak tepi sungai martapura masjid menjadi ikon arsitektur spiritual masyarakat setempat wisatawan berkunjung kota dibangun tahun 1981 diresmikan tahun 1985 masjid dinamai sabilal muhtadin penghormatan seorang ulama besar banjar syekh muhammad arsyad albanjari dikenal nama datu kalampayan masjid dirancang arsitek kenamaan indonesia ir h abdul madjid joenoes menggabungkan unsurunsur arsitektur tradisional banjar gaya modern masjid memiliki kapasitas cukup besar mampu menampung lebih 15000 jamaah bagian masjid dihiasi kaligrafi ornamen islami indah langitlangitnya tinggi kubah besar menjulang menambah kesan megah luas area wudhu fasilitas lainnya didesain sangat baik memastikan kenyamanan jamaah lingkungan masjid sangat asri taman rapi pepohonan rindang sekitarnya memberikan suasana tenang damai cocok beribadah maupun sekadar menikmati keindahan arsitektur masjid masjid raya sabilal muhtadin berfungsi tempat ibadah menjadi pusat kegiatan keagamaan sosial berbagai acara ceramah kajian agama peringatan hari besar islam sering diadakan sini masjid menjadi tujuan wisata religi menarik banyak pengunjung berbagai daerah keindahan arsitektur fasilitas lengkap suasana nyaman masjid raya sabilal muhtadin benarbenar menjadi salah satu kebanggaan kota banjarmasin masjid menjadi simbol keagamaan cerminan budaya sejarah masyarakat banjar kaya beragam

put this on your list to visit if you love history fort rotterdam was built by the dutch on the original fort of the makassar rulers back then makassar was known as ujung pandang interestingly the dutch built the fort using karst stone from maros a region to the north of makassar the fort has been largely preserved the small museum is located within one of the old buildings if you want to know about the original people of the region as well as cool down make your way to it it shouldnt take more than 15 minutes to walk through beautiful and picturesque the fort provides opportunities for some snapshots overall it is a good place to visit when there is no crowd

samalona island is just 30 minutes away from makassar port you can go there with a boat for around 500700 idr you have to ask for a cheap price samalona has a city light view in the night a sunrise view and sunset view they have hostels for you to stay and a there is a mosque in there they also have a restaurant if you want to eat seafood or just chillin with ice coconut or you can bring supplies and cook over there samalona has a snorkling spot you can bring yours or you can rent the equipment over there best time to visit samalone around april september on summer

this museum is housed in a wonderful wooden structure that is representative of the traditional architecture of old gowa the palace of tamalate the museum should enlighten you on the history of the people of gowa the royal family and the nobles the conflicts there are collections of old coins weapons clothing paintings and literature should you want to dress up as a gowa noble you could rent clothes at the museum for a fabulous photo opportunity in summary this museum should be on your list of attractions to visit when in makassar

there are plenty of students visiting during weekdays for school activities they range from junior high school to college students this museum provides a clean environment and beautiful structures it is recommended to come during the morning 8 am above it wont open before 8 am they provide an extensive amount of information about the cultural items put for display weapons fashion literature currency cultural relics and crafts

klenteng tertua kota makassar berdiri kokoh hari klenteng menganut tradisi china taoisme konghucu kalian berada luar kota makassar mau datang makassar sembahyang nih berkunjung vihara ibu agung bahari terletak kawasan pecinan kota makassar sedikit mengenai dewi menjadi salah satu tokoh utama vihara tian shang sheng mu h天上聖母 ptiānshàng hokkientian siang sing bo kantonistin hau dikenal sebutan ma zu mak co hidupnya sederhana gemar berbuat kebaikan masyarakat memanggilnya lin san ren lin orang baik dikenal dewi laut penolong pelaut pelindung etnis china wilayah selatan imigran asia tenggara kultus tian shang sheng mu terutama berkembang wilayah pesisir pantai penduduknya bergantung aktivitas kelautan

klenteng ibu agung bahari klenteng ma tjo poh terletak jalan sulawesi nomor dikenal nama thian ho kong berarti istana ratu langit bangunan bergaya arsitektur cina dibangun orang keturunan tionghoa makassar diketuai kapitan lie lu chang sejak awal dibangun tahun 1738 hingga sekarang kelenteng difungsikan tempat ibadah umat buddha pemberian nama kelenteng berasal nama dewi laut ma tjo poh klenteng ibu agung bahari terdiri atas 4 bagian bagian depan berupa halaman gapura utama unit utama pusat klenteng sayap kiri merupakan beberapa ruangan bagian belakang merupakan tempat sembahyang

this was one of the finest example of old chinese taoistconfusionist temple before it get burned down in 1997 riot yes makassar get it 1 year earlier to the notorious 1998 jakarta riot the remnants of that are still on display which is the front door facing jl sulawesi the rest of the temple is rebuilt into 4 storey building with a big statue of ma co on top of the roof blessing the harbour most of the statues inside are still the original old statues that are kept safe from the fire

bangunan museum berfungsi menyimpan berbagai bendabenda peninggalan kerajaan makassar terutama ditemukan disekitar benteng somba opu tempat museum terletak pembangunannya didedikasikan karaeng pattingalloang salah seorang perdana menteri mangkubumi kerajaan kembar gowa tallo pernah hidup abad ke17 m karaeng pattingalloang sangat haus ilmu pengetahuan memiliki kecerdasan diatas ratarata manusia hidup zamannya terbukti minatnya tinggi barang barang globe pertama asia teleskop pengamatan benda luar angkasa benda kebutuhan penelitan pengamatan ilmu pengetahuan lainnya karaeng pattingalloang menguasai berbagai macam bahasa asing otididak melayu belanda portugis spanyol denmark italia yunani bahkan kemampuannya menguasai bahasa portugis dikatakan sama persis penduduk lisbon ibukota negara portugal sekarang berbicara karaeng pattingalloang berprofesi seorang pedagang ulung masa mengingat makassar sebuah kota internasional disinggahi banyak pedagang asing eropa berdagang rempahrempah rempah rempah tersebut berasal kepulauan maluku diperdagangkan komoditi beras makassar kemudian dibawa eropa masa toleransi antar umat beragama sangat tinggi terbukti berdiri banyak bangunan peribadatan umat agama islam merupakan agama mayoritas penduduk makassar gereja katedral bangunan museum terbuat kayu berbentuk rumah adat suku makassar terdiri 2 lantai lantai pertama berisikan bendabenda daerah benteng somba opu lantai 2 berisikan potret rajaraja kerajaan makassar disini terdapat gambar sultan hasanuddin paling rewa sangar potret selama
terletak satu kompleks benteng somba opu menikmati keragaman rumah adat sulawesi selatan terutama rumah adat tana toraja yah walaupun ga kesana bangunan disini cukup menghibur lah

museum karaeng pattingalloang dibangun area seluas 600 meter persegi bangunan museumnya menggunakan konsep rumah panggung gaya atap menarik koleksi museum terdiri lantai cukup banyak semuanya memberikan pengetahuan keberadaan gowa masa lampau lantai satu melihat berbagai objek hasil ekskavasi dulu menjadi elemen penting keberadaan benteng somba opu menjumpai berbagai peninggalan manusia gowa lempeng tanah liat digunakan instrumen menentukan hari baik berbagai perhelatan pernikahan sudut terpampang koleksi peninggalan perang makassar kerajaan gowa digempur voc ahun 1666 – 1669

visited during weekdays much better cause its not crowded with people we arrived here at time 1000 wib ticket for foreigner total up tp 90k including a drink it is a spot for instagrammer to shot a nice view n it has a unique spot to picture every side of batam you need to hike a bit around 124km roughly but it worth it after certain point u can view a batam n see a few island around there the staff super friendly u can asked them to snap every point n if u bring your own camera like dslr im bringing it today u can teach them how to use it n they will advice some poses that suit with the point theyre fast learner so dont worry bout your gadget they will take a good care your gadget so that u can be in every picture with stunning view the drink was good n not too sweet cause u need some refreshment after settle all the thing if u can speak malay it a bonus for u n them to communicate since its so hot there prepared with hat n sunscreen adviceable to use sport shoes here cause u need to hiking a bit also u can bring a bottle of water while exploring it near with entrance there is pool for kids so u need to bring extra clothes for your kid if they want to do so overall it was a good place to visit n staff will make u comfortable

sensasi cable skiwakeboarding batam menjajal cable skiwakeboarding salah satu permainan watersport olahraga air pemainnya berdiri atas papan ditarik menggunakan kabel olahraga dinamakan cable ski olahraga ski air biasa umumnya ditarik speedboat kabel digunakan diprogram dikendalikan operator wakeboarding sendiri menggabungkan konsep olahraga skateboarding surfing snowboarding perlu teknik keseimbangan tubuh memainkan olahraga batam wake park terletak kawasan bengkong laut bengkong batam watersport terdapat danau buatan menjadi area permainan pemula ahli bermain area terpisah pemula bermain danau lebih kecil diberikan arahan teknik permainan pelatih peselancar mahir berada danau lebih besar keselamatan memainkan olahraga kamu mengenakan life jacket helmet wakeboarding diikat kaki bila siap kamu mulai berseluncur memegang kabel disediakan kabel tersebut bergerak menarik pemain berdiri atas wakeboard terjatuh diawalawal mencoba olahraga lumrah jangan khawatir operator menarikmu tepian bila terjatuh danau terdapat papan luncur menyerupai arena skateboard bila mahir kamu meluncur lancar melewati arena papan daftar harga pilihan paket disediakan 2 jam rp 350 ribu 4 jam rp 500 ribu 8 jam 1 hari rp 650 ribu batam wake park mulai buka jam 0900 1800 hari selasa tempat tutup

staff were very nice and really helped us especially first starting out at the level a system come early in order to get a proper one on one especially when you first starting out as the day passes more people which will reduce dedicated attention only thing is one incident when my friend fell at the c system in the middle of the path no stoppage of other wakeboarders friend had to shout at oncoming ppl to avoid a crash quite a terrifying moment
high quality and professional many singapore customers decent food and drinks great coffee
worth visiting well maintained place low price and not crowded due to weekday 1 hour coaching … you should be able to wake board

the staff are very friendly and helpful willing to patiently guide and instruct newbies there is a beginners pool as well the package here from singapore includes 2way ferry transport lunch and unlimited tries

spent a day at batam wake park with a bunch of friends we were guided the moment we disembarked at batam and led straight to the place the staff were friendly and helpful and pretty much as chill as the place exudes to be the food and drinks available were simple nothing too exotic but delicious nevertheless we did things at our own pace and had a great time

very nice wakeboard park spacious clean the circle goes clockwise best for regular footed wakeboarders plenty of obstacles to play with very decent food quality they offer packages from singapore for the day s88 s30 if you want to rent a pro board this includes ferry at 915am transportation lunch beginner board unlimited use of the wakepark

had my first wakeboarding experience here super fun times great help from the experience wakeboarders who were running the place awesome music super cool vibes 10 our of 10 would come back for more they have prettty affordable packages especially on weekdays despite coming on a weekend still had plenty of chances to try to experience props to the people who were constantly encouraging and giving tips one of my best weekends ever

very disappointing experience i have covered almost every few metres here and the conclusion is there are no big fishes closer to the shore you can use tiny sabiki hooks to get those tiny fishes like baby sergeant major baby butterfly whiptail very hard to get also and tiny cardinal fishes you can fish these at lazarus much easier than here after about 45 hours i only caught a tiny butterfly whiptail with the big hook they gave on the rental rod they should have just given the tiny sabiki hooks instead

if you are not going for the hike the petting zoo area is more suitable for families with young children a total of 4 different areas for the petting zoo deer bunnies fish pond and bird sanctuary 100k per pax for the entrance ticket and some food is provided for you to feed the animals and also a complimentary ice tea at their cafe area is quite open so do remember your sunblocks or hats for the children

it is a compact sanctuary for animals where visitors can get up close with deer rabbits birds and snakes moreover the knowledgeable guides at each station are remarkably friendly and provide indepth explanations about the bird and snake sanctuaries upon arrival there is a promotional offer of 100000 rupiah to witness all the animals and it includes a complimentary iced tea at the conclusion of the experience at the beverage counter we were pleasantly surprised to find a live band performing a few songs

defo get the guided tour we did the 2 hour session and it is not easy for first timers even though its described as a simple hike better wear good shoes with grip as theres uphill and downhill tracks our guide was really patient knowledgeable and handsome too he gave us ample rest points pointed out the interesting plants and facts of the jungle the package includes lunch which you preorder before the trekking so when you end the 2 hour session your food is ready to be served there was also a deer sanctuary at the end of the trek really awed by the size of the sambar deer worthwhile to add this to your batam itinerary if you are into nature but you should confirm your session about 23 days prior

nice place to visit in panbil nature reserve was situated a very short distance away from best western hotel so we decided to pay it a visit we paid about 500000 idr to enter all the enclosures the bird enclosure was great as the birds will interact with you and i managed to feed a parrot by putting seeds on my mouth too the rabbitguinea pig enclosure had really cute animals too and seems to be the most popular enclosure out of all the options there are tickets which grant you access to single enclosures though its a lot more worth it to buy the allinone ticket and visit all the enclosures

traveling upriver is a fantastic adventure start in kota bangun so that you skip the most industrial and ripetitive part take a long boat or the kapal biasa to arrive upstream to melak there you can go up to tirin by car depending on the season the kapal biasa has a last stop in melak and from there look for a long boat to go up and see the limestones walls that bring to long bagun 800 000rp you need some time to go so upstream independently think about 7 days at least otherwise do it with a local guide from samarinda take some more days to stop coming down in the lake regions starting from muara murtai it is the land of daayak people it is difficult to meet more gentle and welcoming villages you will be invited inside the houses

klenteng ban hin kiong merupakan klenteng tertua manado didirikan tahun 1819 kemudian tahun 1839 didirikan rumah abu kong tek su sederhana klenteng mulai dikelola organisatoris sejak tahun 1935 melalui suatu organisasi perkumpulan sam khauw hwee didirikan atas usaha inisiatif orang tokoh yo sioe sien que boen tjen asal kata klenteng bukan berasal bahasa tionghoa suatu bunyi instrumen sembahyang bunyi lonceng genta mengeluarkan bunyi teng bunyi tersebut kemudian disebut klenteng ban hin kiong terdiri 3 kata ban berarti banyak hin berarti berkat melimpah kelimpahan kebaikan kiong berarti istana tanggal 14 maret 1970 klenteng pernah dibakar oknum bertanggung jawab atas inisiatif nyong loho soei swie goan kemudian menjabat rangkap ketua pembangunan ketua klenteng ban hin kiong mulailah pembangunan renovasi klenteng kini klenteng beberapa kali mengalami renovasi bangunan baik penambahan lantai menjadi 3 lantai maupun peluasan ruangan halaman selamat beribadah 🙏😇

taman diponegoro merupakan taman kota berada kota semarang bagian atas terletak pertemuan beberapa ruas jalan jalan sultan agung dh drde vogel weg jalan s parman jalan diponegoro jalan kawi jalan argopuro jalan telomoyo enam ruas jalan tersebut saling berhubungan membentuk sabuk lingkar sekeliling taman diponegoro memiliki ketinggian kurang lebih 2 meter permukaan jalan mengitarinya taman diponegoro terdapat beberapa bangunan penting diantaranya bekas rumah dinas walikota semarang sekarang menjadi rumah dinas kasdam diponegoro kaapel pertokoan sultan agung puri wedari taman diponegoro sendiri merupakan pusat kawasan pemukiman candi baru menjadi titik pertemuan wilayah administrasi kelurahan wonotingal tegalsari gajahmungkur lempongsari kesemuanya termasuk bawah administrasi kecamatan gajahmungkur candisari bentuk taman diponegoro berupa persegi panjang ukuran 50 x 15 meter bagian kedua sisi pendeknya membentuk setengah lingkaran bagian tengah terdapat plaza berbentuk bulat ciri khas tamantaman eropa zaman renaissance axis arah bekas rumah dinas walikota arah axis mencermikan kekuasaan walikota waktu taman diponegoro didominasi hamparan rumput palem raja sepanjang sumbu taman bagian barat terdapat pohon kesambi cukup besar bagian selatan terdapat pelataran berbentuk setengah lingkaran dilengkapi sittinggroup tempat bersantai sembari menikmati panorama gunung ungaran penguna jalan mengenali taman jelas dibuatlah tulisan “taman diponegoro” menggunakan tanaman hias bagian taman menghadap jalan sultan agung bagian luar taman dibuat jalur pedestrian memasukinya pengunjung melalui salah satu empat jalan berupa tangga disediakan pembangunan taman diponegoro dimulai masa pendudukan belanda indonesia pembangunan taman terkait pembukaan daerah candi baru kawasan pemukiman semarang berubah status menjadi staads gemeente kota praja tahun 1906 herman thomas karsten 1884–1945 arsitek asal belanda ditunjuk merancang kawasan candi daerah pemukiman baru kawasan mulai dirancang tahun 1916 konsep garden city konsep dicetuskan ebenezer howard suatu kawasan dalamnya terdapat tamantaman bagian penting kawasan taman diponegoro disebut raadsplein menjadi taman utama dijadikan pusat kawasan candi baru taman diponegoro dibangun beberapa gedung penting diantaranya burgermeesterwoning rumah dinas walikota elizabeth ziekenhuis rs elizabeth ooglijdershospital rumah sakit mata ‘william both’ kaapel jalan telomoyo fasilitas pendidikan van deventer school neutrale school huevel meski taman diponegoro memiliki berbagai fasilitas baik suasana indah masyarakat kota semarang merasa enggan berkunjung taman tersebut masyarakat jarang terlihat berkunjung ataupun beristirahat taman diponegoro terutama waktu siang hari sangat bertolak belakang kondisi taman tergolong sangat baik terawat memiliki fasilitas penunjang lengkap adanya pohonpohon rindang tanah tertutup rumput sittinggroup plaza lampu taman menambah keindahan taman diponegoro padahal sewaktu masa pendudukan belanda taman diponegoro sering dikunjungi masyarakat pemukiman candi baru baik sekedar jalanjalan melepas lelah maupun tempat olahraga

those who enjoy visiting morning markets this is an area worth waking up early to survey and do some shopping including buying fruits produced locally one particularly surprising found is the cafe specialised for good quality coffee humbly called “coffee shop” while waiting for its seemingly late opening at 930am i spoke to the hawkers in the surrounding area all of them have their thumb up for this shop not crowded probably because it is not cheap by local standard but certainly better and worth the money paid this is notwithstanding the fact that i am more a tea drinker
